description: Users may experience unexpected changes in their system privileges when utilizing the Windows USB print driver, particularly for specific builds such as Windows 11 Version 23H2 (10.0.22631.3296) or Windows 10 Version 22H2 (10.0.19045.4170). This issue has been identified under KB Articles like KB5035853 and KB5035845. Affected users might find that unauthorized users can gain escalated access to system functions or sensitive areas of the operating system. Consequently, this could lead to unpredicted behaviors, such as unauthorized changes or access to files and configurations that should remain restricted, raising significant security concerns. The problem is noted within the context of builds numbered 10.0.20348.2340 and 10.0.25398.763, as documented in CVE-2024-21442.
